com.csc207_0898.triageapp

Class Temperature

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.csc207_0898.triageapp.Temperature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Temperature
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class Temperature contains one variable which is a float for the temperate which must be between 10.0 and 50.0 in Celcius.
    See Also:
